Compared to the previous generation, this antenna has a redesigned inner part for even higher efficiency. In addition to the new bands, the gain at 1700 MHz and 2.7 GHz is approximately 3 dB higher than the previous generation. Antenna Poynting XPOL-2-5G  is supplied with double low-loss cable HDF-195 of 5 m length terminated with 2× SMA-m connector. The SMA connector used is commonly used in a wide range of routers. To maximize signal quality and minimize potential transients, the antenna does not use connectors and the cable is connected directly.
